name: Templator
tagline: Based on configuration and template, create output file
body:
# Configuration file params: username: "richy2509" projectName: "templator" templateDir: "/Users/XXX/workspace/templator-model" modelfile: "model.ftl" outputfile: "/Users/XXX/workspace/templator-model/out.ftl" * templateDir : Path folder where models are stored * modelfile : Relative path to the template file from the "templateDir" folder * outputfile : Absolute path to the output file # Model file

Bonjour ${username}

Welcome to ${projectName}

# Run
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
